
The 
    J3DI.js
    J3DIMath.js
    webgl-utils.js

have been downloaded in 2013_03_05 from 
    https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/common/webgl-utils.js
    https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/webkit/resources/J3DI.js
    https://cvs.khronos.org/svn/repos/registry/trunk/public/webgl/sdk/demos/webkit/resources/J3DIMath.js

which were links at 
    http://www.khronos.org/webgl/wiki/Tutorial
